title: Riot rewards trolls
body:
Another game with trolls, no one reports them, they ruin games and get to play another game.
Hey as long as they buy skins right riot?
As long as they buy this months new release champ hey riot?
Imagine if someone did this at work.
Everyone just ignores the guy making trouble, who is stopping people from working  and being counterproductive.
Imagine that he wrecks your workspace or eats all of your food. You tell your superviser but he ignores because no one else has come forward to say anything about it.
Imagine if the police worked like this as well. 
If the person who robbed you has to rob others and many complaints have to be made before they arrest the guy even though you have evidence.

Anyway, I left the game. No point playing if someone is ruining it for you.
I don't care if I get banned.
Will be my first ban in a game in many years of online gaming.
I don't really care either I have three other accounts.

replies.body:
1 - “As long as trolls buy skins & champs Riot’s okay with them.” This is only your assumption, thus there is no real argument here. Your point is thus void.
2 - Your analogy is void because you’re also assuming the supervisor doesn’t do anything if people don’t say so. Riot does have systems implemented which detects trolls and they do do stuff about it. Thus your point is also void.
3 - You left the game which is 100% against Riot’s Summoner Code. Them trolling or not is more or less dependent on the ‘victim’ as identifying it as a troll move or not, but you leaving is absolutely universal of breaking the Summoner’s Code.
4 - You don’t care if you get banned? Well you’re one step closer to it.
5 - Yes I’m using lists because by this post I’m assuming you’re some childish twelvie. But see how this is also an assumption? This may not be correct at all, but if you point out that I just made an assumption which is untrue, then you would also then contradict the point of this post. Thus now I challenge you. Either point out that I just made a void assumption but also make your own point void, or withstand the tremendous amount of hate you’re about to get from the rest of the community.

Your move OP.

Ah the old resorting calling me a twelvie, nice one. Made your whole list not worth anything. I was thining ok this guy has some valid points but then you resorted to name calling.
You whole post is void the minute you made it personal.
I bet you are one of these people in games that calls people kids.
You can't call my points void because it's your opinion, that's not how a debate/discussion works.
Bring on the downvotes.

man, Riot do sh!t I submit so many tickets and I can still see trollers again and again, over n over

just had a troll+feed bot lane Why bcoz our jg took cannon minion, and bot lane duo went 1/10 1/9

and then RIOT says we are helping players, like what? I guess you should not ban to those who are toxic but to those who ruin other players game and make them toxic !!!!! 

Please RIOT use ur brain if not then I am sorry, I feel bad for you

While encountering trolls happens, you should be encountering far more neutral/positive players than toxic ones. Unfortunately, it's always the negative cases that stand out! That being said, if players are repeatedly trolling in game, the automatic feeder detection should have picked them up and they will face punishments. Your reports will also help refine the system and help it to better detect feeders.

When you say you submit tickets, are you doing this through the support site, or in the post-game lobby? Reporting after a game ends is the best way to deal with this as the instant feedback system can then work to deliver a punishment to the offender's account within 15 minutes.
Lol OP u just proved my point then

Well in my opinion it depend on what your view of 'trolls' is. 

If they were just playing something out of meta like teemo jg in normals, they didn't really do anything wrong. They're just having fun with a video game. 

However if it was ranked that's a different story. But even then, they technically haven't done anything wrong, but it still pisses me off.

BUT, if they played something out of meta and intentionally fed, or just did things that were completely stupid which lost you the game, THAT goes against rule 4 of the Summoners Code (which states that you can't purposefully sabotage a teammates game or something I think).

And yeah if they just stole lane, instalocked or were being toxic, that's obviously wrong and the only thing you can do is report them and move on.

Double jg instalocker. Waiting for the last hit when my smite is on cd. Dealt with it so much.
It jsut comes down to normals being fucking horrible with roles. Even though we all call first when getting into champ select I find it's still a fight with certain fucktards who still instalock even though myself and the rest of the team are telling them to supp.
If it was someone at work, then that person is being paid by the company. In this situation, the person is paying the company. Without that person there would be no game
